battleship2000.programlogic.rules

Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.rules.Rules
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicRules

    public class Rules
extends Object
    This class contains the rules used when creating a new instance of CreateGame control class.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio
